Package comp3111.covid

Class ChartDataAnalysis

java.lang.Object
comp3111.covid.ChartDataAnalysis
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChartADataAnalysis, ChartBDataAnalysis, ChartCDataAnalysis
public abstract class ChartDataAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
An abstract class for chart's data model. It is used to produce chart data.

  • Method Details

    • getChartData

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.time.LocalDate,​java.lang.Double>> getChartData​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> countries, java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.time.LocalDate endDate)
      This method produces chartData based on selected countries, startDate and EndDate. The data is a map, whose key is country, with value being another map: 
                      {
                        startDate: queried_value1,
                        startDate + 1: queried_value2,
                        :
                        :
                        endDate: queried_valuen
                }
      Parameters:
      countries -
      startDate -
      endDate -
      Returns:
      the chart data, in the form of a map of countries, each mapped to another map of dates with their respective queried values.
